about_the_game:
After waking up, Sophie finds herself in an eerie place and sets out to free tormented creatures and, discover if this is real or just a nightmare! Dive into a breathtaking match-3 adventure as you find your path through the cursed labyrinth and fight the dark forces that appose all who enter.

- 120 unique and challenge levels
- Relaxed, Challenge and Timed modes
- Collect coins to boost your power-ups
- Plan your moves to get all three stars
- Immersive storyline with unique characters
detailed_description:
After waking up, Sophie finds herself in an eerie place and sets out to free tormented creatures and, discover if this is real or just a nightmare! Dive into a breathtaking match-3 adventure as you find your path through the cursed labyrinth and fight the dark forces that appose all who enter.

- 120 unique and challenge levels
- Relaxed, Challenge and Timed modes
- Collect coins to boost your power-ups
- Plan your moves to get all three stars
- Immersive storyline with unique characters

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1.0GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1.2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

name: The lost Labyrinth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/10
  • Processor: 1.0GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: After waking up, Sophie finds herself in an eerie place and sets out to free tormented creatures and, discover if this is real or just a nightmare! Dive into a breathtaking match-3 adventure as you find your path through the cursed labyrinth and fight the dark forces that appose all who enter.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch
*languages with full audio support
